channel.title: Science on Clusters and Climate
channel.description: Recent content in Science on Clusters and Climate

item.title: एल निनो – ला निनाचा भारतीय हवामानावर परिणाम: बातम्यांपलीकडचे सत्य
item.description: भारतातील पावसाळा आणि हवामान हे नेहमीच चर्चेचे विषय असतात. दरवर्षी “एल निनो” किंवा “ला निना” या शब्दांचा उल्लेख बातम्यांमध्ये हमखास होतो.

item.title: Indonesian Throughflow: River in the ocean that affects Indian Monsoon rainfall
item.description: Climate is one of the most discussed and followed topics around the world. There are many climatic phenomena such as El Nino – La Nina, and their effects are well known worldwide.

item.title: Saturn and Jupiter's Great Conjunction: A Once-in-a-Lifetime Event?
item.description: A lot has been said about the rare celestial event occurring on December 21, 2020—the Great Conjunction of Saturn and Jupiter.
